actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to require formal advertising for contracts for services or supplies for the Veterans Administration's loan guaranty program if the contract amount exceeds $25,000.

summary.text: Amends Federal law concerning the administration of veterans' benefits to require formal advertising for contracts for services or supplies for the Veterans Administration's loan guaranty program if the contract amount exceeds $25,000 (currently $1,000).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to require formal advertising for contracts for services or supplies for the Veterans Administration's loan guaranty program if the contract amount exceeds $25,000.
